quests.title: Find Friend at the Mansion
quests.description: Locate a friend who may be at a mansion, as instructed by the quest giver.

quests.title: Find Friend at Mansion
quests.description: Locate a friend in a mansion and investigate the surroundings.

quests.title: Mansion Investigation
quests.description: Go to the mansion to locate a friend and uncover any hidden information.

quests.title: Discover Hidden Lab and Crystal
quests.description: Find the hidden passage in the basement, enter the study/lab, and determine the purpose of the crystal and machine.

quests.title: Find Friend in Mansion
quests.description: Investigate a mansion to locate a friend of the quest giver.

npcs.name: Sjaak
npcs.description: A figure who attacks the party and later teleports away.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage discovered in the mansion’s basement.
plot_hooks.details: A secret entry concealed behind barrels and slime trails leads to a study/lab area.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal and machine found in the hidden study.
plot_hooks.details: A crystal is located next to a machine; its purpose and connection to the teleportation incident remain unclear.
Sjaak was teleported away after interacting with the machine, raising questions about the mechanism and its effects on the party.
Despite searching the mansion, no sign of the friend was found, leaving the main objective unresolved.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer barrel in the basement.
plot_hooks.details: The party discovered a secret doorway after manipulating a barrel, leading to a study/laboratory.

plot_hooks.summary: The purpose of the crystal found in the hidden laboratory.
plot_hooks.details: Hints suggest a crystal is involved in a device, possibly tied to money or teleportation.
Sjaak was teleported away from the laboratory, leaving the party confused about why.
The original objective was to find a friend, but no one responded inside the mansion.

plot_hooks.summary: Traces of ooze in the mansion
plot_hooks.details: Spore traces of ooze are found in the mansion, suggesting a mysterious creature or contamination.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer vat
plot_hooks.details: A concealed entrance behind a broken beer vat leads to a basement with a secret laboratory.
Inside the laboratory is a crystal and a machine that can teleport individuals, leading to an incident where someone was teleported away.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden laboratory with a crystal and machine behind a disguised vat.
plot_hooks.details: The laboratory contains a crystal and a machine that seem to be connected to teleportation. Sjaak was teleported away after the machine was activated.

plot_hooks.summary: Tracks of 'oezes' and slime trail leading to hidden entrance.
plot_hooks.details: There were traces of 'oezes' (unknown creature) and slime near the vats, suggesting prior activity and a hidden passage.
The original quest was to find a friend in the mansion, but it remains unclear whether they were found.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind beer barrel with slime trail
plot_hooks.details: The basement contains a concealed entrance revealed by a slime-like trail and leaking barrels.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal and machine in secret laboratory
plot_hooks.details: An underground laboratory holds a crystal and an unnamed machine, suggesting a larger plot.
Sjaak was teleported away after the encounter, hinting at teleportation technology or a powerful spell.

plot_hooks.summary: Hints of someone working with strange stone or crystal
plot_hooks.details: Notes mention advice about a stone or crystal and the desire for more money.

locations.name: Mansion
locations.description: An old mansion of faded glory visited by the party.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: The mansion's basement, containing vats and a hidden passage.

locations.name: Hidden Passage
locations.description: A secret corridor behind barrels, leading to a study/lab.

locations.name: Study/ Laboratory
locations.description: A hidden room in the mansion housing a crystal and a mysterious machine.

locations.name: Hidden Laboratory
locations.description: A study/lab behind a disguised passage in the basement, containing a crystal and machine.

locations.name: Secret Laboratory
locations.description: A hidden room behind the basement containing a crystal and a machine.

locations.name: Basement of Mansion
locations.description: The basement houses barrels and a hidden passage to a secret laboratory.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: A crystal used in an unnamed machine in the secret laboratory.

items.name: Machine
items.description: An unknown machine in the hidden laboratory, likely a teleportation device.

items.name: Teleportation Machine
items.description: A machine capable of teleporting individuals, powered by the crystal.
